resources.string:
Welcome to FTCScoring! 
 
This program is designed to take match scouting to a different level. This easy to use app will allow you to enter team details after they play a match. The programs MMR algorithm takes care of the rest. 
 
Just enter 1-10 for each field (10 being the highest) and let the program do its magic! At the end of your scouting press "Get Best Team" and watch the app statistically get you the best alliance partner! 
 
Happy Scouting!
*Algorithm gets best team based on MMR system. May not provide the best in game results.*
